content: angry duckling amigurumi stuffed toy designed by julia redman www sapphirechild etsy com julia redman@gmail com materials 1 ball each white and yellow fuzzy worsted weight acrylic yarn or yarn of choice scraps of black and pink worsted weight yarns size h or 8 5mm crochet hook darning needle fiberfill stuffing gauge is not critical here but this one was at 3 5 single_crochet per inch please note this pattern is for personal and non-commercial use only moc yste dlihcerihppas instructions body tail to neck worked in rounds with white chain 2 4 single_crochet in second chain from hook do not join 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 8sts total single_crochet in next single_crochet then 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 15sts total single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next 8 single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet 25sts total single_crochet in each single_crochet around for twelve rounds single_crochet in next 12 single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet 23sts total single_crochet in next 11 single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next single_crochet decrease two times single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet 20sts total single_crochet in next 10 single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet 18sts total single_crochet in next 8 single_crochet decrease single_crochet in next 5 single_crochet decrease single_crochet in last single_crochet 16sts total single_crochet in next single_crochet slip st in next 5 single_crochet single_crochet in next single_crochet decrease half_double_crochet in next single_crochet yo draw up loop in next 3 sts yo and draw through 4 loops on hook yo and draw through 2 loops on hook half_double_crochet in next single_crochet decrease 12sts total single_crochet in next single_crochet slip st in next 5 sts single_crochet in next single_crochet hdc2tog draw up loop in next 2 sts yo and draw through 2 loops yo and draw through 2 loops double_crochet in next st hdc2tog 10sts total single_crochet in front loop of next 8 sts double_crochet in row below on both sides of next double_crochet 2sts single_crochet in next st 11sts total single_crochet in next 2 sts single_crochet in front loop of next 3 sts single_crochet both loops in next 3 sts draw up loop in next double_crochet the double_crochet from the row below and the next double_crochet yo and draw through all loops on hook single_crochet in next single_crochet 10sts total bind off stuff body add rock in belly for weight if desired head worked in rounds with white chain 2 5 single_crochet in second chain from hook do not join 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around 10sts total single_crochet in next single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet five times 15sts total single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet five times 20sts total single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet five times 25sts total single_crochet in next 4 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in next single_crochet five times 30sts
